Bitcoin SV is like the Internet Protocol (IP). The Internet Protocol is what drives the internet. There are many layers built on top of IP such as TCP, UDP, http, or even (at a stretch) html but they all absolutely depend on the throughput of IP.

One of the main goals of Bitcoin SV is to provide massive unfettered capacity, just like IP, to process huge amounts of Bitcoin transactions, to enable global use of the blockchain. The potential uses of this capacity? There are so many, some we have not even dreamed of yet.
